channel.title: Mute on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Mute on Metricly Docs

item.title: Mute Policies
item.description: This silences all attached notifications for the policies selected for a set duration. You can manually unmute a policy at any time as well. Select all policies you wish to mute. Click Mute Notifications. Input a mute duration and click OK. Your selected policies will remain muted until your chosen duration expires or when you manually unmute them.
